scripts.publish-packages: npm run bootstrap ; lerna run build && node scripts/bump-version-push-publish
scripts.build: lerna run build && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.start-playground-plain: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env PLAIN_DEVTOOL=true webpack-dev-server --config packages/playground/webpack.config.js
scripts.submodules: git submodule update --init ; git submodule foreach npm i
scripts.start:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=chrome node scripts/webextension/dev-server.js
scripts.start:chrome-debug-connection: cross-env DEBUG_CONNECTION=true cross-env NODE_ENV=development TARGET_BROWSER=chrome node scripts/webextension/dev-server.js
scripts.build:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET_BROWSER=chrome node scripts/webextension/build.js && echo 'Chrome built'
scripts.start:firefox: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=firefox node scripts/webextension/dev-server.js
scripts.test: npm run test:unit ; npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TARGET_BROWSER=chrome node scripts/webextension/build.js && npm run test:e2e:chrome:now
scripts.test:e2e:chrome:now: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=chrome mocha test/e2e
scripts.test:e2e:firefox: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TARGET_BROWSER=firefox node scripts/webextension/build.js && npm run test:e2e:firefox:now
scripts.test:e2e:firefox:now: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=firefox mocha test/e2e
